item.title: Trump administration halting $10 billion in social service funding to 5 states
item.description: The Trump administration plans to halt billions of dollars in federal funding for social services programs in five states led by Democrats following a...

item.title: U.S. oil companies won't rush to re-enter shaky Venezuela, experts say
item.description: The Trump administration is counting on U.S. oil companies to revive Venezuela's creaky energy production and tap its massive reserves.

item.title: How police departments' poorly-enforced rules enable off-duty misconduct
item.description: Across the U.S., police officers moonlight in bars, clubs, and private security jobs with little oversight. A CBS News and Howard Center investigation...

item.title: What's the maximum income when filing for bankruptcy?
item.description: Income limits vary by bankruptcy type, state, and household size, but they're typically higher than people expect.

item.title: GOP Rep. Jim Baird and wife hospitalized after car accident, Trump says
item.description: President Trump said the Republican congressman from Indiana was in a "bad accident."
